text: Mokhtar Hashim (1 May 1942 â€“ 17 November 2020) was a Malaysian politician. From 1981 to 1983, he was the Minister for Culture, Youth, and Sports in Mahathir Mohamad's Cabinet. Hashim died on 17 November 2020 in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia at the age of 78. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Malaysian politicians
title: Mokhtar Hashim
